text: |} is a Japanese athlete. She is best known as a weightlifter who has competed in three Summer Olympic Games.SportsReference.com (SR/Olympics), "Hiromi Miyake" ; retrieved 2012-7-30. ==Career== In July 2012, Miyake won the silver medal at the 2012 Summer Olympics in the 48 kg category."Mingjuan Wang wins Olympic gold for China in 48kg weightlifting," BC (UK). 28 July 2012; retrieved 2012-7-31. ===Timeline=== * 2004: Athens Olympics * 2008: Beijing Olympics * 2012: London Olympics ==Related pages== * Sports in Japan * Japan at the Olympics ==References== == Other websites == * Hiromi Miyake at London212.com Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic silver medalists for Japan Category:Weightlifters
title: Hiromi Miyake
